titleInfo.title: Schluckebier v. Assisted Living Concepts
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 18 Motion to Extend. Jury Trial set for 10/29/2012 at 09:00 AM before Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. Pretrial Conference set for 10/16/2012 at 09:00 AM by WebEx before Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. An email will be sent to counsel of record with the instructions and codes for participating in the pretrial conference by WebEx. Telephone Conference set for 6/21/2012 at 10:00 AM by telephone before Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (DMS)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 4:11-cv-03111; Schluckebier v. Assisted Living Concepts;

titleInfo.title: Schluckebier v. Assisted Living Concepts
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - (1) The plaintiff's motion, 46, and the defendant's objection thereto, 51, are each granted in part;(2) On or before January 14, 2013, the defendant shall pay $100 to the plaintiff for losses she incurred due to the unavailability of defendant's representative to attend the scheduled settlement conference.Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (BHC)

titleInfo.title: Schluckebier v. Assisted Living Concepts
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER - IT IS ORDERED: The parties' motions for summary judgment (Filings 33 & 38) are denied. Defendant's motion to strike the declaration of Fawn Ienn (Filing 57) is denied as moot, as the court did not consider the declaration in reaching its decision to deny the motions for summary judgment. Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (TCL )

titleInfo.title: Schluckebier v. Assisted Living Concepts
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER regarding filing 71 Motion in Limine. The motion in limine shall be held in abeyance and not considered until the first day of trial during the pretrial conference which will be held in chambers immediately prior to trial, unless a party shall show cause, within three working days of this order, why such deferral would be inappropriate. Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (GJG)
